name: BJJ Heroes x Scramble T-Shirt
description:
BJJ Heroes x Scramble T-Shirt, 'Heroes Never Die'

BJJ Heroes collaborated with the Japanese inspired BJJ brand, Scramble, to produce this awesome Jiu Jitsu T-shirt.

Featuring artwork from Tony Easley at Nascent Ideas this item features a heather grey, soft poly/cotton mix. Mid-fit.

SIZES
Small: up to 36in Chest (96cm) or slightly over.
Medium: up to 40in Chest (101cm) or slightly over. 
Large: up to 44in Chest (111cm)
Extra Large: Up to 48in Chest (121cm)

PLEASE NOTE: The cost is in British Pounds. The cost of £25 equates roughly to 
$38 (US Dollars)
€29.5 (Euros)

Please keep in mind these are estimates put together at the time of the product's placement on the website and may vary slightly depending on current rates.

name: BJJ Heroes Jiu Jitsu Patch
description:
1x BJJ Heroes Jiu Jitsu Deluxe Patch

Support BJJ Heroes and look cool doing it with this superior quality woven patch with very fine detail.

Size: 7inch/17cm (diameter)
Colour: White, black and red

PLEASE NOTE: The cost is in British Pounds. The cost of £8 equates roughly to:

$12 (US Dollars)
€9 (Euros)

Please keep in mind these are estimates put together at the time of the product's placement on the website and may vary slightly depending on current rates.


LIMITED STOCK!
